name: Hide and seek (itch) (Mike)
description:
CONTROLS: 

F | LMB - TOGGLE FLASHLIGHT 

E | RMB - COLLECT ITEMS 

L.CTRL - CRAWLING 

L.SHIFT - SPRINT 

ESC - OPEN / CLOSE MENU

GOAL: 

COLLECT 7 ITEMS WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT BY ROBOTS IN ORDER TO ESCAPE THE BUILDING

This game was created within 4 days during a game jam.

Assets created not by me:
Robot model by Unity Technologies 
Office Pack by Asset Store Originals
Animations by Kevin Iglesias
